DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this clinical investigation is to collect high-resolution pulse oximetry, RRp, and RAM data in pediatric subjects for the purpose of algorithm optimization and to build a database of representative pulse oximetry and respiratory signal profiles for patients in this population.
DOC.brief_title: Plethysmographic and Acoustic Respiration Rate Clinical Data Collection
DOC.criteria: Age: 0 to 5 years old Fully developed skin Subjects with skin abnormalities at the planned application sites that would interfere with sensor application. Subjects with preexisting conditions and/or comorbidities that would prohibit them from participating in the study due to unacceptable risks to their health and wellbeing, as determined by the Principal Investigator (PI). Subjects deemed not suitable for the study at the discretion of the investigator
